final_content:
# Parent/Guardian Sign-Off for Field Work

Before participating in any service fieldwork activities, students must obtain parent/guardian approval through our digital signature system. This ensures that parents/guardians are fully informed about the nature, location, and requirements of the fieldwork experience.

## Authorization Process:
1. Log into your Excel High School Student Portal
2. Navigate to the "Field Work Authorization" form under the "Forms & Documents" section
3. Review the fieldwork details with your parent/guardian
4. Have your parent/guardian provide their digital signature on your device
5. Submit the completed form at least 48 hours before your scheduled fieldwork

**Important Notes:**
* Students without proper authorization will not be permitted to participate in off-campus service activities
* Parents/guardians can access additional fieldwork information through the Parent Portal
* If you need assistance with the authorization process, contact your Success Coach

For homeschooling families: Both the student and the parent/guardian acting as the primary educator must complete separate sections of the authorization form.
editing_explanation: No AI patterns detected, no edits needed.
